comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: She resembles Elizabeth II of England. Wonder if they're related? Why, sure. She and Elizabeth's grandfather (George V) were cousins, and all descended from Victoria: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sophia_of_Prussia

comment.author: 22876714@N03
comment._content: Wow, she had such a tiny waist. I'm sure the corsets helped, but even so, it's tiny.

comment.author: 38663314@N04
comment._content: Queen Sophia of Greece was actually the grandaughter of Queen Victoria of the United Kingdom since she was the daughter of her oldest daughter, Princess Victoria, and Friedrich the III, the German Emperor and King of Prussia. She was born in Germany in 1870 and died in Germany in 1932 from cancer. More information can be found here: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sophia_of_Prussia

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
rjones0856 and skammas:

Thanks for your information on Queen Sophia. We will expand the record when we update.
